# Application Kit Versions for NSBrowser Functionality

**API Collection**

The version of the AppKit.framework containing a specific bug fix or capability.

## Constants

- **NSBrowser.ColumnResizingType**: Types of browser column resizing.
- **NSBrowser.DropOperation**: The type used to specify the drop type of a drag-and-drop operation. See [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSBrowserDelegate/browser(_:validateDrop:proposedRow:column:dropOperation:)] for more information.

items.description: The type used to specify the drop type of a drag-and-drop operation. See [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSBrowserDelegate/browser(_:validateDrop:proposedRow:column:dropOperation:)] for more information.
items.name: NSBrowser.DropOperation
